thread.title: Carmelo Anthony wants a break to 'get away from everything'
thread.title_full: Carmelo Anthony wants a break to 'get away from everything'

author: Jordan Heck (jordan.heck@performgroup.com)
title: Carmelo Anthony wants a break to 'get away from everything'
text:
February 13, 2017 8:37am   8:37am EST Basketball, NBA, News, New York Knicks, English, Carmelo Anthony The Knicks star really doesn't want to play in the All-Star game. Carmelo Anthony (Getty Images) 
Updated at 8:37 a.m. ET 
Updated at 8:37 a.m. ET 
Carmelo Anthony could be asked to serve as a replacement for Kevin Love in the All-Star game, but it doesn't sound like he really wants to. 
"I got plans," he said, via ESPN , about filling in for the injured Love. "I would love to take this break and just utilize this break and my body and my mind and just get away from everything. I could utilize this break. If they call me I'd consider it. But I would love to utilize this break." 
MORE: Spike Lee criticizes James Dolan while wearing Charles Oakley jersey 
Anthony really could use a break considering everything he's been put through. The Knicks aren't great, the team president is openly criticizing him and, oh yeah, he's also in the middle of several trade rumors. 
Through all of it, he's kept his composure and has taken the high road on everything. So a little trip away from basketball is probably something he's been looking foward to. 
As for Love, some other replacement options include Joel Embiid (although he has his own injury), Melo's teammate Kristaps Porzingis or potentially the Wizards' Bradley Beal. Watch This
